meanings.definition: Direct one's hopes or ambitions toward achieving something.
meanings.sent1: She aspires to become a doctor and help people.
meanings.sent2: He aspires to be a great artist one day.
meanings.sent3: The little bird aspires to fly as high as the big eagles.
meanings.sent4: Her determination aspires to reach the stars of success.
meanings.sent5: Their hard work aspires to greatness and accomplishment.

meanings.sent1: The skyscraper aspires above all other buildings in the city.
meanings.sent2: The mountains aspires majestically into the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cake aspires in the oven, making the kitchen smell delicious.
meanings.sent4: The flames of the bonfire aspires towards the dark night sky.
meanings.sent5: The rocket aspires into space, leaving a trail of smoke behind.
